SEARCH
Package model

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Circle
model.Ball
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Resizable
public class Ball extends javafx.scene.shape.Circle implements Resizable
Represents a ball in the game, characterized by its speed, direction, and behavior upon collisions. The ball's movement is defined by its speed along the X and Y axes.

  • Property Summary

      y - The Y coordinate of the ball's position.
